name: Exantor Divo

attributes.name: Affiliation(s)
values: Hosnian Prime Academy of Law Enforcement
Hosnian Prime Academy of Law Enforcement

content:
Exantor Divo was a human male that served as a police commissioner on Hosnian Prime.
Exantor Divo was a human male and the son of Andressa Divo, and the grandchild of Tanivos Exantor Divo and came from a long line of law enforcement personnel. Upon his graduation from the Hosnian Prime Academy of Law Enforcement in 19 ABY, he intended to become a Sector Ranger.
By 34 ABY, he was the New Republic police commissioner on Hosnian Prime and lived on the planet with his partner and two children. At that time, he compiled case files from his grandfather, mother, and his own career into a volume.
Exantor Divo is the in-universe author of the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
